description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED CONVERSION OF ROOF SPACE, ERECTION OF REAR ROOF EXTENSION AND ERECTION OF SECOND FLOOR ROOF OVER ANNEX. INSTALLATION OF ROOFLIGHTS.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B and Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B and Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of a swift nesting box/bricks on the site.
